activities.title: Completed Production AI Portfolio
activities.description: Finalized 10-project enterprise-grade AI portfolio featuring RAG systems, LangGraph agents, LLMOps pipelines, and production infrastructure. 292 Python files with 138+ tests.

activities.title: Completed FedPhish Portfolio
activities.description: Finished 21-day privacy-preserving federated phishing detection portfolio. Includes production system with React dashboard, ZKP verification, and research paper.

activities.title: Completed Federated Learning Security Portfolio
activities.description: Finalized comprehensive 30-project portfolio on FL security. Features SignGuard novel defense system achieving 94.5% detection rate. 165,000+ lines of production code.

activities.title: Completed SignGuard ECDSA Verification Module
activities.description: Implemented cryptographic signature verification for federated learning model updates using ECDSA with dynamic reputation scoring.

activities.title: Study: Byzantine-Robust Federated Learning
activities.description: Deep dive into recent papers on Byzantine-resilient aggregation strategies for federated learning systems.

activities.title: Three Major GitHub Portfolios Completed
activities.description: Successfully completed three comprehensive portfolios: FL Security (30 projects), FedPhish (21 projects), and Production AI (10 projects). Combined 265,000+ lines of production code.

activities.title: FraudwareAnalyzer: 100 Malware Samples Analyzed
activities.description: Completed static analysis of 100 banking trojan samples. Extracted behavioral patterns and API call sequences.

activities.title: Started ZKP Integration for FL
activities.description: Beginning implementation of Zero-Knowledge Proof integration for privacy-preserving model verification in federated learning.

activities.title: Published: Understanding Byzantine Attacks in FL
activities.description: Wrote comprehensive blog post explaining different types of Byzantine attacks in federated learning and defense strategies.

activities.title: SignGuard: Reputation System Implementation
activities.description: Implemented dynamic reputation scoring system for FL clients with decay mechanism and anomaly detection.
